title: acct
description: A JARM hash sample taken from a server.

avatar.description: The file representing the avatar (e.g., profile picture) for the account.

dob.description: A self-declared date of birth for the account (if the account belongs to a person).

email.description: The email address associated with the account.

linked:accts.description: Linked accounts specified in the account profile.

latlong.description: The last known latitude/longitude for the node.

place.description: The geo:place associated with the latlong property.

loc.description: A self-declared location for the account.

name.description: The localized name associated with the account (may be different from the account identifier, e.g., a display name).

name:en.description: The English version of the name associated with the (may be different from the account identifier, e.g., a display name).

aliases.description: An array of alternate names for the user.

occupation.description: A self-declared occupation for the account.

passwd.description: The current password for the account.

phone.description: The phone number associated with the account.

realname.description: The localized version of the real name of the account owner / registrant.

realname:en.description: The English version of the real name of the account owner / registrant.

signup.description: The date and time the account was registered.

signup:client.description: The client address used to sign up for the account.

signup:client:ipv4.description: The IPv4 address used to sign up for the account.

signup:client:ipv6.description: The IPv6 address used to sign up for the account.

site.description: The site or service associated with the account.

tagline.description: The text of the account status or tag line.

url.description: The service provider URL where the account is hosted.

user.description: The unique identifier for the account (may be different from the common name or display name).

webpage.description: A related URL specified by the account (e.g., a personal or company web page, blog, etc.).

recovery:email.description: An email address registered as a recovery email address for the account.
